Texts.Chs: 把^orange;加工台^reset;带回^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给^green;我^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^green;Machining Table^reset; to ^orange;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 非常好！我们随时都欢迎你的到来，如果你愿意，你可以随意使用这里的所有仪器。
Texts.Eng: Great! Welcome, and feel free to look around and get comfortable. You're welcome here. Use the facilities if you please.

Texts.Chs: 问候。陌生人！我是Vinalisj，是这里的负责人。在你真正接触科学之前，你首先得证明你的能力。在基础合成中^green;默认快捷键[C]^reset;制作一个^orange;加工台^white;，并把它交给我。
Texts.Eng: Greetings, traveller. I am Vinalisj, the Director of this facility. Before you can really get started here you'll need to prove your worth. Make a ^orange;Machining Table^white;. ^green;Build one on your default crafting menu [C]^reset; and bring it here.
